substitution.copyText: '' but in my terms of honour| I stand aloof, and will no reconcilement,| Till by some older Masters of known honour| I have a voice and president of peace| To my name ungor'd: but all that time
Serve me the floops of wine, upon th table;
And let the Kettle to the Trumpet speak,
substitution.amendedText: now let the Kettle to the Trumpet speak,
